attributes.action: Prevent airlines from excluding themselves from any liability for losses you incur due to changes they make
attributes.additional_details: We are all sick and tired of those clauses in the terms and conditions when you book a holiday that mean airlines are able to refuse you any compensation when you incur losses due to them changes flight time, date etc. I urge you to sign this petition to bring in a law that prevents them from doing so. When you lose money or reservations due to their changes whether they accept it or not we all know they are responsible so let's ensure that from now on they have to accept liability and compensate you for your losses
